title: Strengthening Business Strategy Practical Competencies: Instruction Based on the PADPIE Model for Integrated STEM Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can explain the 6 stages (Preparation-Analysis-Design-Planning-Implementation-Evaluation) and 25 detailed tasks of the PADPIE model.
Learners can establish a concrete implementation plan applying the PADPIE model when designing an integrated STEM education program.
Learners can develop a checklist for designing microlearning activities applicable in smartphone-based environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
